rapidly been growing in reputation and scale since then.  As a result of this growth, the company is in need of a Business Manager to help coordinate key client-facing and operational activities.§The practice’s core purpose is to inspire business owners and high performers to create their Purpose, live their Values and experience Success, Happiness and Fulfilment by running a business/life to be proud of.  Our values include: ‘Do What You Love & Love What You Do’, ‘Live Your Why & Help Others Find Theirs’, ‘Every Week’s a 7-Day Weekend’, ‘Work When Inspired, the rest of the time PLAY’, ‘Transparency AND Confidentiality’.§Key responsibilities for this role include:§Contract Management:§Tracking and scheduling all client sessions, forecasting coaching and facilitation capacity§Flagging ‘end of contract’ timing and assisting in negotiating renewals§Overseeing and/or administering invoicing and expense reconciliation in Xero (experience with Xero preferred but not essential)§Event Management:§Help identify Strategic Partner selection & relationship building§Event venue selection§Scheduling – where/when§Hold Christopher Miller accountable to developing event advertising content on time§Set up and manage Meetup or Eventbrite (or another platform of choice)§Manage social media promotion of events (primarily Facebook & LinkedIn)§Brief the practice’s web developer and graphic designer on any promotional needs§Help build video script for each event and assist with filming§Edit videos and/or assist outsource partner§Track registrations & send out event reminders§Arrange event materials to venue§Arrange event catering (when appropriate/necessary)§Intellectual Property Production§Take rough concepts or content from Christopher Miller and create finished material (e.g. workbooks, powerpoint presentations, online tools) with help and support from both Christopher’s design agency and web manager§Build strategies to promote the right Intellectual Property to the right audience§E-mail marketing strategies (Knowledge of Mailerlite or similar system would be ideal)§Web landing page development with free content offers for e-mail capture and addition to the practice database§§Practice Strategic Planning§Plan and schedule team meetings to build and refine the Strategic Plan§Quarterly – Christopher Miller and Business Manager review§Annually – practice full team of strategic partners (Business Manager, Design Agency, Web Manager, local Thought Leader partners/mentors)§§Client Relationship Leadership§Key point of contact for all clients§Annual client survey (phone or Typeform)§Build Customer Intimacy system / process to remain connected to clients (e.g. birthdays / anniversaries / client-specific events)§Navigate outputs on Cascade (CliftonStrengths reporting tool) relevant to client delivery sessions§§Christopher’s coaching and mentoring practice is a strengths-based organisation that lives by the philosophy that we are all wired to be exceptional at something.  The challenge in modern life is choosing what to be a genius at, and letting other people excel at what they are best at.  Christopher’s natural talent is best served being with clients as a coach, facilitator, mentor or speaker.  Much of the business operations described in this role profile, will help him spend more time doing what he does best AND find a great person who loves owning all of the responsibilities above.§Based on the volume of clients and planned events at the moment, I would expect this role to begin with 5-10 hours per week and grow over time.§§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in New Zealand?§How many years' experience do you have as a business manager?§How many years' experience do you have in a marketing role?§Do you have experience managing teams remotely?§§§
